metadata.name: Walk Through the Lines
metadata.description:
I have always found outstanding architectural structures aesthetically appealing to the eye. 

I love how all the geometrical shapes, lines, diagonals and curves shape this structure that blends and interacts with its environment. The changing direction of light displays lines, shadows and contrast in a beautiful way, ever changing at different times of day.

Seeing people walk by, ride bicycles and spend their leisure time here magnifies the beauty of this structure as I think it comes to life with humans.

I took this photo on a beautiful morning while many people were riding their bikes, jogging, walking, going shopping through this path. 
This girl particularly caught my eye with her red outfit at the first instance, but then I realized what captured my attention the most was her firm and energetic walk giving me the feeling of crisp, fresh boost of the mornings and new beginnings.
